If you need a great home-feel hotel in and around OC, then this place is for you. The pool and hot tub are nothing to rave about and should definitely look into renovating. The fire pit however was great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us while visiting Costa Mesa.  We do have a great location close to South Coast Plaza and the airport.  Carmellia is a great asset to our team and I am so glad you got to meet her.  We will be renovating our rooms and pool area this fall and hope you will come back and sit and enjoy the pool and firepit again.

Summary: We are in a hotel in OC once a week during the school year.  It's usually on Thursday, but this week we are here on a Wednesday.  This week there is a huge convention in Anaheim, and there are very few hotel rooms available, which is how we ended up here.  It seems to be an older property and our room showed it.  However, what was worse than being an older property was the fact that it was not clean.  In the dishwasher was other guest's dirty dishes.  Also, the sofa bed was torn and dirty.  I'm thankful for the extra flat sheet so that my daughter can sleep on it with a mattress pad, flat sheet and then fitted sheet.  It's okay, but I'm not sure we will be back.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay.  I apologize for the issues and will follow up with our team.  We will be renovating our hotel in the fall and hope you will come back and see the new rooms and sofa beds.

Summary: We had a great time staying there. The staff was excellent in attending to our every need and that along with the breakfast buffet made our stay very enjoyable. Special thanks to Carmella,Chad, Brenda, Anthony and the kitchen staff who made us feel very much at home. As usual, being a Marriott, this place is up to the usual standards one would expect, but the staff and service is what makes this place special. It's clear that it's under great management that cares about their customers. My thanks to Susan who has fostered such a great team.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay at the Costa Mesa Residence Inn.  I will be sure to pass on those great comments in our morning meeting and recoginze the team for making you feel at home.  Glad that you were able to start your day off with our buffet!  Please come back and see us again soon.

Summary: The high point of this stay was the breakfast buffet.  I really felt  like I was having a true O.C. experience.  In addition to the usual waffles, scrambled eggs, oatmeal, there was : Rice, furikake, Miso Soup, various Asian and Mexican hot sauces, unknown sauces,  seaweed, chopsticks, you get the idea.  I told the manager that if ONLY we could get Italian coffee, it would be perfect ( Marriott needs to work on the coffee) Nice grounds, good pool. Hot tub, though, was only lukewarm.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay at our Costa Mesa Residence Inn.  Breakfast starts your day off and so glad you that enjoyed all the many choices we have at our buffet each morning.  I am so happy that we were able to help you enjoy your time in Orange County.

Summary Heading: The staff makes this hotel a winner.
Summary: We are Marriott Gold travelers and there really isn't much to differentiate one Residence Inn from another.  But, in Costa Mesa the staff makes the big difference.  Everyone at the front desk was very friendly and engaged us in conversation.  Staff at breakfast was also very friendly and helpful as was the shuttle bus driver.  I hope Mr. Marriott takes notice of this great crew!
Manager Response: We are so happy that our staff was able to make your stay in Costa Mesa so enjoyable. We appreciate you taking the time to recognize and thank the team and I will be sure to pass these comments on during our daily meetings.  We look forward to seeing you next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Dated, but good location and amenities
Summary: Stayed 2 nights for business because of proximity to the SNA airport, Irvine and Newport Beach's seaside dining. Property is starting to show it's age, room smelled slightly of smoke and workout equipment needs updating. Complimentary breakfast and happy hour were better than most other Residence Inn's I've stayed at.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and so happy you enjoyed our breakfast.  We are planning a rooms renovation next year to help update our rooms and hope you will come back and experience our brand new rooms.  Our location is great to enjoy the beach, South Coast Plaza and centrally located to San Diego and LA.  We hope that we will see you again.

Summary: I was there for about 3 weeks and the experience I had there was actually awesome. Morning breakfast is pretty impressive with a wide range of varieties. The room staff was also really good. I liked the receptionist there dont remember her name but full of energy. It is a great stay for this price. And damn how did I forgot the evening beer they serve Mon to Wed
Manager Response: I am so glad that we were able to be your "home away from home" during your extended stay visit.  Happy to hear that you were able to enjoy both our breakfast and happy hours.  I will pass on the great comments to our staff and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: As much as good customer service is mandatory for us when travelling, I wanted to pass on how especially pleased we were with the customer service at the Residence Inn Costa Mesa. While each and every staff member I came across, from maintenance to house keeping to the shuttle driver, were absolutely awesome, I especially want to thank Sue Cooke, Manager, for all that she did. She really went out of her way to fulfill any request we had. Her pleasant attitude was infectious. I have stayed at many Residence Inn locations and I highly recommend this location if you have the opportunity to stay.
Manager Response: You and your team were so great to have here and it was a pleasure helping out in any way I can.   Thank you for such great comments and we can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best customer service we've ever experienced...
Summary: The folks at this hotel need to be commended for truly outstanding customer service - beyond the call.  We were treated like royalty.  The rooms were spacious and very nice and clean. We were surprised that there was no elevator to the 3rd floor. That's a long walk for someone recovering from surgery. Also, the units we stayed in were not in a hallway, but rather our door just opened to the outside. Maybe that's just California? Others have raved about the complementary breakfast, but we found it just about average. Still, I give this place a VG rating because of the people there. Again, truly outstanding. I would return... asking for a first floor room!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel.  At Residence Inn we pride ourselves on our customer service and so happy that our staff took such great care of you.  We are glad that you will make our hotel your "home away from home" when you come to the Costa Mesa area. We look forward to seeing you very soon.

Summary: Been to many hotels with traveling softball and this Hotel has far and away the best breakfast buffet we have seen and or tasted. Our travels have included Nor Cal , So Cal, Reno and Las Vegas. Great job!
Manager Response: Thank you Shanon K for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We're excited to learn that our breakfast stands out from the rest of the Residence Inn's you have visited. We hope to continue to welcome you and your softball team during your tournaments in the Orange County area!

Summary: The consistent exceptional service of each employee cancelled out any other minor issues with this property. The assistant manager and front desk employee (former Disney employee) delivered outstanding customer service. Yes it is a bit dated and the property appears to be a former apartment complex so it is not the exterior isn't appealing but the rooms were spacious, accommodating, clean, and fit our needs for the trip.
Manager Response: Thank you TrvlLuv for your review of our property Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We're so happy you enjoyed the exceptional Marriott service our associates bring to our property. We love when our associates get recognized on a platform like TripAdvisor. We are very happy to hear our property suited your needs and you were able to have a pleasent stay with us. We hope to see you again when you travel to the Southern California area!

Summary: The management and staff could not be nicer. They try to accomodate your every need. We try to stay here whenever possible. Susan, the manager, treats you like family. (Only in the good way.) We recently had a 25 hour plane delay to Europe. Susan immediately gave us a conference room to make necessary calls and extended our stay until it was time to leave the following afternoon. Susan exemplifies the qualities we love in the Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you smmjuw for your gracious review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We love hearing rave reviews about our staff. We're happy to learn we were able to accomodate you during your travels. We do our very best, especially in a plane delay situation, to make sure you always have a room for you. We hope to see you again when you travel to the Orange County area.

Summary: I checked in for an 11 day stay several days ago and wish I could check out now.  The challenges have been many.    Had to move rooms after security visited my upstairs neighbors who had to have been a herd of buffalo??  Woke me up at 12 and at 4am.    Now I can't seem to get ANY HOUSEKEEPING at all.  I guess they don't provide it on Sunday's???  What I did get earlier in the week was iffy at best. The girl at the front desk is either ineffective or just does not care at all.  I've stayed here 3 or 4 times before and had OK experiences.  Nice front desk staff and good housekeeping.  Not sure what changed, but it's not so good anymore.    When I check out, I will never be back.
Manager Response: Thank you SlvrPdle for your review of our property. Since I have called you personally to rectify this situation I am hoping you reach ut to me so we can satisfy your current stay and provide you with the Marriott service you have come to know and love. We hope to continue to see you visit the property and hope that our due diligence in following up with you shows our commitment to guest first service.

Summary: High quality rooms/suites.  Excellent customer service and staff.  Close to South Coast Plazza shopping.  Also, close to Beaches and other fine restaurants. Will stay at this property again.  Many fine restaurants close by.  MAGGIANOS is one I would recomment, both for dinner and HAPPY HOURS.. This is a very special hotel, good room sizes, excellent pool and very good staff. Joe Tosto
Manager Response: Thank you JoeT for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We're to learn how well our hotel fits your traveling needs. We hope to see you again soon when you travel to the Orange County area.

Summary: I am a Marriott member so always try to stay at one of their places. I had reserved a car, but couldn't get it when I arrived, and the hotel provided a van service that took me where I needed to go immediately. No waiting. The staff were all wonderful and helpful, they have a free terrific breakfast, and the room was large and modern, with a full kitchen. Very quiet, room was in a little townhouse type building. I highly recommend this hotel, if you are NOT in the market for a full service hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you MBurren for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We are happy to hear you were able to utilize our best amenities, our complimentary shuttle service to & from John Wayne Airport & our complimentary full breakfast. Thank you for your comments about our staff we will be sure to pass them along to everyone. We hope you got a chance to take advantage of our other great amenities like our 24 hour finess center. We can't wait to welcome you back when you travel to Costa Mesa again!

Summary: This Residence Inn turned out to be quite different from most.  It looks like small apartment buildings, but the room we had was quite nice and had everything you'd expect from a Residence Inn; full size refrigerator, stove and microwave.   The lighting situation could be improved in the living area.  There's just one very small window, and there are porch overhangs, so if you're on the ground floor, there's very little light.  A larger watt bulb in the floor lamp would certainly help.  There is a small patio, with sliding glass door, that lets in light, but it's not in an area that has any furniture.  The place could use some patio furniture, but since it's near 3 freeways, sitting outside is probably not a priority.  There is a nice area by the pool where you could enjoy being
Manager Response: Thank you Discerningwon for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We thank you for the input about the lighting in the rooms.   We will work with our Chief Engineer on this and hope we can improve that for you and other guests. We are hoping when we get the chance to renovate our property that we will be able to utilize the patio space as you have suggested. We do find that most guests do prefer to lounge  near the pool if their room is in close proximity to the toll road we are near.   We're happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast each morning. We hope you were able to take advantage of our other amenities such as the Social Hour or Fill Your Fridge program.  We hope to see you again when you travel back to the Orange County area!

Summary: We stayed in one of the upstairs units. Our family of 6 had space with 2beds/bath and pullout couch. We had the room for three nights. The room was clean and the full kitchen was useful. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you gai01983 for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you were able to enjoy our various complimentary amenities on property, such as our buffet breakfast & 24 hour fitness center. Our 2 bedroom penthouse suite is a great option for families and we're happy it was a great fit for yours. We hope to see you again the next time you travel to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: An evening business trip in Orange County...
Summary: A cheerful welcome upon my arrival. This was a business trip and a one night stay. My room 1821 - upstairs, was generally clean and spacious. It did seem a bit stuffy and air was stale, but it may have just needed an airing out. It did seem comfortable enough for an extended stay especially with the kitchen. I was surprised by how quiet the room was at night even with close proximity of a freeway. The breakfast in the morning was complete with cereals, fruit, eggs, waffles, etc. There's a pool and a fitness room but I didn't have the opportunity to use them. Maybe this is a common thing in residence inn's but I found the plastic hangers a bit odd and out of place. There was an issue on my final bill that wasn't resolved immediately until I filled out the on-line survey, then all
Manager Response: Thank you Geoff G for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa Newport Beach. We are delighted to hear you got to enjoy our property and most of it's amenities. Our complimentary morning breakfast is definitely a high point for our guests. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the location of your room as well.  We hope to see you again when you come back to the Orange County area so you can enjoy our pool & fitness center as well!

Summary: We stayed in the Penthouse Loft - one of the rooms which accommodates our family of five.  We had a late check in, went to a night wedding and reception and basically fell into bed on our return.  In the morning, while we were getting ready we discovered the horrible housekeeping.  I'm not sure when this room was last used or cleaned.  We found food in the kitchen sink, sand in both bathtubs, the bathroom mirror in the master bathroom was completely splattered with who knows what, the bottom stairs toilet had several hygiene issues and I can't even begin to explain what we found under the bed when my husband went to pick up his dropped phone.  All I can say, the clean crew took a vacation instead of us.  We called the front desk, but they didn't appear overly concerned and said
Manager Response: Thank you GobClan for your review of our property. Our deepest apologies for the service you experienced during your stay. We are very sorry we could not rectify this situation prior to your check out. We have undergone major retraining within our housekeeping departing and are confident that this mistake will not happen again.   I invite you to contact me personally so we can discuss your experience with our property. We hope you continue to stay with Marriott throughout your travels.

Summary: Currently staying at Residence Inn in Costa Mesa and I find the property subpar by Marriott standards.  Old, outdated - seems to be an old apartment complex converted to a hotel.  Despite being a platinum Marriott member, I would not recommend this property unless substantial capital improvements are made.
Manager Response: Thank you ConstantTraveler822 for taking the time to review or rooms and overall property. I invite you to come to the front desk and let me know of any specific recommendations you may have for us. We always love to hear the opinion of our Platinum Rewards Members since they stay in our hotels so often.   We hope you continue to visit the various Marriott properties in the area and continue your continued patronage of Marriott around the world.

Summary Heading: Not what one expects from Marriott
Summary: We arrived for a seven night stay on a Monday afternoon expecting the usual "Marriott " quality.  We did not get this on this visit.  The main problems were  overall room condition and housekeeping.  1. Bathroom shower curtains had mold – replaced on first request by housekeeping 2. Upstairs floor not vacuumed on Tuesday, Wednesday Thursday, and Friday during housekeeping visits.  Perhaps only vacuumed partially on Saturday after 4 requests made to front desk.  Could not be sure as dirty tissue visible under upstairs bed that was present on arrival was still there.  Finally disposed of it ourselves. 3. On Saturday – returned to room to find 2 separate piles of trash lying on end table in living room and on upstairs railing by top of steps.  These were left after apparent visit
Manager Response: Thank you irenebook for your honest & thorough reveiw of our property. We hope you were able to enjoy the surrounding area of Orange County and our easily accessible shopping centers & nearby beaches.  To touch on your various housekeeping issues we have decided to undergo an extensive retraining/recoaching session with our entire housekeeping staff to ensure they are living up to our guests Marriott expectations. We hope our efforts will help us forgo another sitution happening like this again.   We hope you continue to enjoy other various Marriott properties when you visit the Orange County area once again.

Summary: Stayed here for business. Very nice hotel. Large rooms with kitchen. Walking distance to shops and food. Exercise room is decent and the hotel has a basketball court. Service was very good. Close to John Wayne airport. Free Wi-Fi and parking
Manager Response: Thank you JBL303 for your review of Residence Inn Costa Mesa-Newport Beach. We're happy our property was in such a convenient location for you with all of the amenities you needed. We hope to see you again when you visit the Orange County area.

Summary: You get what  you expect from a Residence ... clean rooms, all the ammenities, nice pool and hot tub. A gas fire pit at the pool is a nice bonus. A nice outdoor basketball court with synthetic base court. And of course, a very nice breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you Bill F for your review of our property. We're happy you were able to enjoy all of the Residence Inn amenities you know so well. We hope to see you again when you come back to visit Orange County.

Summary Heading: Good location, good mid-point option for Newport, Laguna and Anaheim
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights on points. We had mostly planned to tour Newport, Laguna and Balboa Island. I would have preferred to stay a bit closer, but for free and the amenities it offered, it was a great choice for us. We also used this as a stop before we spent a few days in Anaheim, so it was nice to not have to travel very far.  The pool area was nice - there was also a sports court and a fire pit. The breakfast was great too - more than continental.  We had a ground floor room next to the pool, which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property. We're happy you were able to get all the extra amenities and still be close to the beaches you wanted to visit. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Hotel is very clean and furnished like all Residence Inns with full sized refrigerator and stove. Inclusive breakfast was good and complimentary wifi worked well. Hotel is in easy walking distances to fast food restaurants and convenient stores. It was a short drive from the hotel to the beaches.Our room was located on the bottom floor and was a little noisy. There seemed to be a lot of families with kids staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you Dave S for your great review of our property. We hope you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our amenities. We're happy you enjoyed the surrounding area and all of the activities around our location. We're very sorry to hear your room was not as relaxing as you anticipated. Since we are designed like individual apartments we thank you for giving other travelers the great tip! Yes, since we are in our full swing leisure season we do have many wonderful families who love the value in our property. We hope to see you again when you travel to the Orange County area. And we'll reserve a top floor room for you!

Summary Heading: Comfortable and relaxing -- loved our stay here
Summary: This property is absolutely charming and homey. Yes, there are families staying here with small children, but from our suite we heard absolutely no noise and certainly no barking dogs as some other reviewers have stated.  Our studio suite was spacious, with three closets, wood-burning fireplace and, of course, the kitchen. Since we last stayed here two years ago, there is now a two-sided executive desk that can do double duty as a dining table, plus has lots of outlets for electronics.   The staff is always gracious and accommodating. As with all Residence Inns, abundant breakfast buffets are included.  The laundry was a little pricey -- I've stayed at other Marriott properties where the laundry detergent is free. The fitness area has three treadmills (2 with tvs), an elliptical
Manager Response: Thank yo CoolAZMom for your review of our property. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your room and our great amenities. We hope to see you and the family again when you travel to the Orange County area!

Summary Heading: May be great for a long stay but not for a short business trip
Summary: It appears that there are many families staying on the cheap for Disney, lots of buses coming in and out with workers and tons of dogs barking.  Close to everything but next to nothing.  Drive the extra few miles to stay somewhere more exciting.  You can hear all of the foot traffic above you plus doors slamming and dogs barking.    On a positive note.... the front office staff are amazing and super attentive and nice.  They know a thing or two about customer service!
Manager Response: Thank you ldsummers for your review of our property. We are very sorry and surprised to hear our location was not up to your expectations. We hope we were able to resolve any noise issues you had with your nearby neighbors. We are very happy to hear that our staff showed you great hospitality. We know they are the number 1 reason our regular repeat guests come again and again. We hope if you don't visit us again that you visit one of our sister hotels in our expanding Marriott family!

Summary: You can tell by my 5-star rating I think this hotel is great, and after living here for more than three weeks I feel very confident in my selection. The reason for our stay was an unexpected renovation at our home. We live about two miles from the hotel and picked Residence Inn because of their pet policies. We’ve enjoyed our stay so much we recommended the hotel to my niece and nephew who will be visiting at the end of July. (Our nephew is allergic to dogs but the hotel has pet-free rooms too.) Let’s start with location: You may think that being so close to the 73 Freeway would be a negative. Not so. The freeway access is so convenient that I shaved 10 minutes off my daily commute even though I live very close to the hotel. Further, the hotel is just down the block from a
Manager Response: Thank you Sagarbhakta for your review of our property. We are so enthralled that you enjoyed your stay so much that you're spreading the word to friends and family! Our best advertising is first hand word of mouth experience. We know being away from your home is always stressful and that's why we aim to make you so comfortable and happy at Residence Inn Costa Mesa- Newport Beach that you foget you're away from home. We hope to continue to see you when you visit friends and family that stay with us from your great recommendation!

Summary: I lived in this hotel for eight months due to an open ended business project in Orange County.   It's an older RI and that comes with dated stuff and not the best layout - yet my stay was good to excellent.  The staff, led by Sue Cooke, is awesome and work very hard to take care of their guests.  Cleaning staff did a good job although I only had them in once a week.  As a long term guest, I really appreciated the full oven and full size fridge.  I was in an Extended Stay prior and only had a cook top.  Room was a little cramped but overall good workable layout.  Pool area is nice and the grounds are beautiful.
Manager Response: What can we say to Zingrrl, but thank you, thank you, thank you. We greatly appreciate you taking the time out of your busy schedule to write us this wonderfully honest review of our property. We can't wait to see you when you come down for an actual vacation! And we hope it's soon! We'll see you next time Zingrrl!

Summary: Terrible.....depressing...needs renovations, actually a tear down would be more like it.  Advertised as a penthouse suite....ugh.  Very old and depressing.  It was like an old hotel...the luggage had to be dragged upstairs into the supposed "Penthouse".  What a joke......no help with the luggage.
Manager Response: Thank you Kolsass for your review of our property. We will touch on the issues you mentioned in our next renovations. Our #1 priority is making your stay relaxing and fun. We do our best to offer assistance with luggage at our guests' request. Although we did not meet your expectations we hope you continue to stay with Marriott in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 Nights on a Business Trip. Had to tow my luggage a long way from the reception for a room right at the backside, not something I was looking forward to after a long flight!  The room itself was cramped and the kitchenette was protruding into the living area. The breakfast was average with the spread real sparse. However the front desk staff were cordial and helpful.  Having stayed in a few RIs in my time, this one turned to be surprisingly poor. Lot of work needed to be put in to give the property a modern, contemporary feel. Disappointing!  Ravi J
Manager Response: Thank you ChinchillRavi for your honest review of our property. We are sorry we did not live up to your expectations. Although our property is not a new Residence Inn we do understand that our layout does not please everyone, but our loyal repeat guests rave about it. We hope you continue to visit Residence Inn by Marriott even if it is not our particular location. Once again thank you for noting some of the issues you experience and we will be sure to address them during our next renovation!

Summary: This older Residence Inn is trying.   Not one of their best properties.   The kitchen/living area is poorly layed out.   Very crowded with the sofa less than 6 ft from the TV.   Same annoyances as other residence inns.  No waste basket in the room or bathroom.  You have to walk the trash to the kitchen sink.   Staff ignores the water shortage and runs the dishwasher daily with as little as one glass in it.  I found various artifacts from prior visitors in the dresser.  Overall pretty clean.  Hanging your towel so you can reuse it is ignored.   Breakfast is okay, standard.   But get there early, no refills readily available.   So so stay.
Manager Response: Thank you lynne B for your humble review of our property. And thank you for bringing these issues to my attention. I will be sure to review this with our Housekeeping Director to ensure our housekeepers are aware of these. We do our best to ensure a thorough cleaning of your room on a daily basis and we want to be sure we are creating and earth friendly environment. We hope you were able to enjoy the other complimentary amentities provided on our property and your stay was relaxing and rejuvinating. We hope to see you again when you are travelling to the Southern California area.

Summary Heading: Value & Service- A Breath of Fresh Air
Summary: Our family of 5 purposely landed in a TWO-story suite here to capture beach time while juggling end of the year college activities. The BIG surprise was the SUPERIOR service provided by the front desk who helped me conduct my personal business lightning fast, and the friendly staff throughout the beautifully manicured property! My two college students shared an upstairs loft, and thankfully, their own bathroom! My husband & I enjoyed the privacy that our room offered with two french doors separating us from our high school son who slept on the sleeper sofa in the adjoining living area. All of the beds were amazingly firm yet comfortable! The complimentary breakfasts offered a bountiful selection, the best that I have seen! My favorites: two varieties daily of scrambled eggs,
Manager Response: Thank you very much Jenny S for your review of our property. We strive to always provide the great customer service you speak of to each and every guests everyday. We are so happy to hear you and your family were able to enjoy our on-property amenities and that our Penthouse Suite was just the right size for your family. We do love when our guests rave about our complimentary buffett breakfast since it's such a great value to your stay. We're also happy you were able to catch one of our 3 day per week dinners! We hope to see you again when you travel to the Orange County area. And we promise to have the jacuzzi up and running with bubbles on full blast for you next time.

Summary: Very nice stay here.  Front desk staff was most pleasant and made me feel as if I was staying with family.  Parking setup is among the best I've ever experienced.  Room was very clean and linens/towels top notch.  Proximity to shopping, airport, beach, and dining is a plus.  My new "First Choice" for Orange County accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you BrianMillerSantee for your review of our property! We greatly appreciate your honesty and we're happy to hear you had a great stay. We can't wait to welcome you back to your new "home away from home" when you come back to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Terrific Service - Beautiful Landscaping - Impeccably Clean
Summary: We came into this hotel as a starting point to meet up with some California family,  prior to a conference in Long Beach.  The staff interaction was principally with Chad and Oscar,  although the General Manager,  Susan and the rest of the staff were exemplary.  This location is an older location,  though completely up to date.   It is comprised of 8 unit,  2 story,  apartment style buildings.  The grounds are beautifully landscaped and as Impeccably Clean as the insides of the rooms.  The pool deck was small,  but had a hot tub, large grill and food prep area,  and a (propane) fire pit to hang out at.   We had a small issue using a gift card (the issue was OURS) and the staff worked diligently to correct it and see that we were able to use it with no further problems.  WOULD
Manager Response: Thank you DJ3-YTOWN-OH for your review of our property. We're happy to hear you were able to enjoy your mini vacation with us. We hope you were able to enjoy all of the amenities of our property and the California sun. We're happy we were able to resolve your gift card issues and handle it in a professional manner. We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you visit the Orange County area.

Summary: The kitchen in our room came equipped with everything we needed to make a meal during our stay.  There was plenty of room for lounging as well with a small couch and coffee table and a kitchen counter/desk area.  The continental breakfast gave a nice full spread too (I didn't find anything lacking).
Manager Response: Thank you Anton F for your honest review of our property. We're very happy to hear you were able to put the full kitchen in your room to good use. We're also excited to hear that you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We hope you and your family enjoyed your time with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed two nights in a studio that was more than ample in space and accommodations. Fitness room, pool, breakfast were all done well. Nice staff that was friendly and helpful without being overbearing. Will gladly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Russ M for your review of our property. We are delighted you found the stay and room to your expectations. We hope to see you again when you travel to the Orange County area.

Summary: Stayed in a studio room for around a month. It was definitely a best experience. Staff are extremely humble & helpful. The hotel taxi can take you for rides within 5miles radius which is very handy. Any kind of help can be sought out from the staff. Special thanks to Sue. Her warm guesters & smile are energetic. Keep this going always!!  Never faced any challenges except for bandwidth of internet. Internet is slow at times & frequently breaks.  Food, be it brekfast/evening salada are fresh & available.
Manager Response: Thank you White2909 for your wonderful review of our property. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us during your business travels. We hope to see you again soon and welcome you back to your "home away from home"!

Summary Heading: Nice location, nice staff, but room has flaws.
Summary: Originally reserved 2 consecutive nites (1 on me and next on my husband) but we ended up staying 1 and didn't check in the next nite.  This hotel is in a really nice location that is close to many places we wanted to go and the staff were friendly and nice.  Because this hotel is set up like a 2 stories apartment complex,  I asked for a 2nd floor room because I didn't want to hear noise from upstairs.  We got room 521.  It must be me but the suite seems smaller than the typical RI suites and getting to it was a little cumbersome because the staircase is built thinly with concrete steps and metal railings.     Didn't get a good nite sleep because every time the ac kicks on, there was a beep that last for almost a whole minute.  Then the head of the bed is right at the wall that
Manager Response: Thank you lricketson for your review of our property. I am happy to hear you and your family were able to experience our dedication of guest service through the staff. I'm sorry to hear your room did not meet your expectations. I am meeting with the engineering team to tackle the issues you had in your room. I extend my apologies for your noisy neighbors. I hope my staff encouraged you to reach us at any time to ensure your stay was enjoyable. I am sorry we were not able to do this for you.   I invite you to contact me directly to discuss what we can do for you to see you again in the future. Although you decided to shorten your original stay we are glad our sister property was able to accomodate you and we hope your stay was top notch there. We thank you for being loyal to Marriott and all of it's brands.

Summary: Fantastic hotel to stay in ... Its the staff that really make it what it is ... From the moment you step into Reception until checking out, you are always put first, no request is too big or too small. Monday to Wednesday a basic menu service is provided, with free beer and wine. Brilliant to relax and unwind after the day. Nice gym and pool / hot tub. Even though it was suppose to be winter, we enjoyed using these during out stay. Great location, not far from the super South Coast Plaza with its mall & restaurants.  Hopefully we will be back again with no hesitation of booking this hotel again. Thanks to everyone at Residence Inn for making us feel so welcome. Alan from Ireland
Manager Response: Thank you Al. We enjoyed reading your wonderful review of our property and we are so excited to hear you were able to experience our guest first service. We hope to see you again in the future and welcome you back to your "home away from home".

Summary: Front desk staff were friendly, genuine and pleasant, even though they were working on New Year's Eve and New Year's morning. The room was clean, bed comfortable and quiet. I will stay here again when I go to visit my daughter in the area.  Next time I will use the fireplace!
Manager Response: Thank you MarciaAK for your wonderful review of our property. We look forward to becoming your "home away from home" on future trips to the area. We're sorry you weren't able to enjoy your step out patio. Next time as for a room on the 2nd floor and it will be more accessible for you. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We had not experienced staying at a Residence Inn previously, although obviously the Brand is well known to us.  From the truly genuine Welcome by all at the Reception Desk upon our arrival, to our departure; our expectations were exceeded, measurably.  The Manager and staff addressed every need (photo Copies, Set of Scales, extended stay request)  promptly and with sincere pleasure. All staff we encountered were hospitable, and the very hard-working Breakfast Crew, remarkable.   Congratulations on being able to deliver this level of Guest satisfaction.  Staying at this Hotel contributed immensely to our enjoyment of our Southern LA visit to Orange County.  Bruce W. McIntosh CHA President McIntosh Alliance International Hotel Development, Inc.
Manager Response: Thank you BruceMcI for your lovely review of our property. We truly appreciate when others in the hotel industry notice our hardwork and dedication to "guest first" service. We are happy you were able to enjoy the amenties Residence Inn has to offer. We hope to see you again when you are in the Orange County area.

Summary: Stayed here New Year's Eve and originally reserved a penthouse suite. I wanted to show my 2 friends the beautiful suite this property had to offer and I was extremely disappointed by the fact that they had "stay overs" who made it impossible for me to get the suite I reserved. Instead they put us in two different rooms. We were there to have a good home-cooked dinner and ring in the new year together peacefully, but sadly this wasn't the case. Having worked for hotels before, I understand overbooking but I also know you give priority to guests with reservations. I would've had the "stay-overs" transfer room types if this was such a big issue or at the very least have some type of compensation for my inconvenience. To say that the staff seemed unapologetic about the whole issue.
Manager Response: Thank you Patty C for your review of your stay with us. We are very sorry that we could not guarantee your room type upon your arrival. We do our very best to accomodate every guest in their pre-booked room type, but being an extended stay hotel we do have guests that actually reside at our property. We are sure you can understand our delima on nights when we have over sold our limited amount of penthouses on whether to give two of our regular suites to a guest staying one night or ask a guest who has been with us for 3 months to move for one night. We would have happily found other accomodations for you so you, your friends, and family could all be together in one room.   I am personally sorry for the apathetic attitude the front desk may have taken. I invite you to contact me personally so we can rectify this situation and invite you back to the property so you can truely experience our guest first service and all of our amentities our property has to offer.

Summary Heading: Good hotel at a good location
Summary: I stayed in this hotel for over a month as part of my official trip to Newport Beach.  Good things : Good Staff, Nice breakfast and dinner, good location (Best buy and stater brother is very nearby), Nice ambiance, clean and tidy.  Improvement points : Should have more shuttle service, at times I need to wait more than 1 hour to get shuttle when my rented car broke down which was bad experience. should serve dinner a little extra time because when you come to Newport you are looking for holiday and you tend to come in late and at that time dinner was over.  Pizza joint at the market adjacent to it is awesome and there is beer store, taco store is open 24*7.  Spa was good and it has a gym which is nice and all major equipments are there. Room is nice and hotel is well connected
Manager Response: Thank you rahul2755 for your honest review of our property. Here at Residence Inn Costa Mesa our number one priority is our guests and we hope our staff provides a great long lasting impression on all of our guests. Although our shuttle service is available for all of our guests at any time we go have some days when our shuttle van is out quiet a bit and with South Coast Metro area traffic sometimes the wait is longer than we anticipate so we are very sorry for any inconvienence this may have caused you.   Our complimentry social hour is a highlight of our property providing light dinners for our guests and at the two hour length of time we have found that it is longer than most other Residence Inns in our area. Not to mention that once it gets into the late evening we are wasting food because most guests have retreated to their rooms. We do our best to accomodate any request and even if we are cleaning up social hour we will still find leftovers for anyone who asks.   We are happy you were able to utilize our gym area during your stay. We hope it helped keep your daily regimine in place during your time here with us.  We hope to host you in the future during your next time here in Orange County. We look forward to welcoming you to your "home away from home"!

Summary: My family of six stayed in a 2 bedroom suite while visiting Disneyland. The hotel and room were very nice and clean. The suite offered plenty of room for a big family. Disneyland is only about 20 minutes away so this was a much better alternative than staying at the more expensive hotels closer to Disney. The morning hot breakfast buffet is included which was another bonus and money saver.
Manager Response: Thank you kz04jd for your wonderful review of our property. We hope you got the most out of your stay with us. Our two bedroom Penthouses are very versitile and popular for families and we're glad your were able to secure one during your time here. We're happy to hear you took advantage of the complimentary daily hot breakfast. We hope you consider us for future family vacations in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Home Away From Home Kind Of Hotel
Summary: My husband and I had a pleasant 2 night stay at this Residence Inn while visiting a friend of ours.  Our room was clean complete with a full size kitchen stocked with pots, pans and utensils.  So if you like or need to cook....this hotel is perfect. You'll need to supply your own dishwashing soap and sponge though. It's also close to shopping, freeways, John Wayne Airport, restaurants and not too far from Disneyland.  We enjoyed the heated swimming pool and jacuzzi.  There is a bbq grill in the pool area but we didn't use it.  We look forward to staying at this particular Residence Inn in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you Boltsfan858 for your review of our property. We are so happy your were able to utilize our various amenties on property such as our pool area and in room kitchens. We strive to make your stay relaxing while in the Orange County area. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: A perfect Residence Inn which doesn't give late checkouts
Summary: This is a quite perfect Residence Inn. The rooms are nice and spacious, the location is easy to get to by the freeways. It has a quite quiet and safe surrounding. The staff is helpful and cordial, and the breakfast is nice and the choices are plenty. The lobby has a computer which you can print stuff for free. The only downside is that they only give 1pm "late" checkout for elite members. Don't know whether this happens at all Residence Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael C for taking the time to review our property. We truely appreciate your great mentions of our property.  Although we do allow late check outs for our Marriott Elite rewards members it is based on availability. Some days are busier than others and our housekeeping staff is limited so we still do our very best and offer the latest check out we can without hindering our productivity to turn the room for guests arriving.   We know that every Residence Inn is different so we can't speak for all of them, but we hope you consider us for future stays when you are in the area.

Summary: I was impressed with this hotel. The 1 bedroom suite was spacious and very nice.The staff was very nice and truly focused on customer service. The rate was reasonable for this area. The location was very conenient to the freeways,shopping, restaurants, business areas. I look forward to a return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Anthony C for your review and for pointing out the value in our property and recognizing our dedication to "guest first" service. This is really what sets us apart from other extended stay brands in our immediate area. All of our employees are trained to deliver you wonderful service and nothing is ever "too much trouble" for us to give our guests.   We hope you consider us again when you come to our area. We look forward to welcoming you back to your "home away from home".

Summary Heading: Stay here in a spacious room
Summary: As a "residence" the experience is different than a standard hotel/motel, and obviously caters to a long term stay.   There is no hotel bar, or room service.  There is breakfast and a small selection of items for sale such as soda, beer, and ice cream.   Even though I stayed only one night, I found it to be a very good place to stay.  It's not a fancy place, but the rooms are very spacious and clean.  The one issue is the key system and the doors.  I don't know if it was because of  the rain that may have caused the door to swell, but I was completely unable to open the door to my room.  I had to call to have someone open the door for me.  Then (!) I could not get the door open to get out of my room.  I had to call for help again.  Thanks to Devon, the on-duty staff person who
Manager Response: Thank you NorCalHereAndThere for your gracious review of our property. We love that you found your room(s) spacious and relaxing. We want to extend our apologies for the trouble you had with your door lock. We are working diligently with the manufacture to rectify the problem you had so this doesn't happen to any other guests in the future. Thank you for pointing out Deven's quick response. We do our vey best to ensure that we rectify all problems immediately for our guests.   We hope you consider us for future stays during your time here in the Orange County area.

Summary: My wife and I decided to surprise our kids with a trip to Disneyland.  I picked this hotel because it had good reviews, was well priced and the location was perfect for us.  It was a 15 minute drive to Disney and was near the beaches.  The staff at the front desk were very friendly and helpful.  We even received an email before we arrived asking if we had any special needs or requests and providing us with a point of contact before we arrived.  I really liked that touch.  I thought that the Breakfast bar was nicely stocked with what you would expect from a Residence Inn.  It got crowded at times but they had extra seating upstairs so it wasn't a problem.  As for the room we were placed on the bottom floor.  It had a king bed, a pull out couch and a kitchen.  There was enough
Manager Response: We thank mike89t for his review of our property. As we've said before we do greatly appreciate when a Top Contributor takes the time to review our property and give their honest opinion.   Thank you for pointing out our staff and their dedication to providing each and every one of our guests with "guest first" service.   We do our best to provide a variety of options during our breakfasts and social hours. We are currently starting to focus greatly on providing more gluten free and vegetarian options for both. Although our gatehouse does get busy during the weekends we do our very best to accomodate everyone.   We would like to reach out to mike89t and welcome him to contact myself personally so I can get some more information about the particular room he was in. We would like to rectify the problems he experienced in the room so we know this doesn't happen to another guest in the future.  We do know that some of our rooms are not in the best shape and maintaining them to the best of our ability is accomplished by guest communication with the front desk. We encourage our guests to express these problems directly to the front desk so that we can immediately rectify them so they can continue their stay in comfort.   We are anticipating a renovation in the new year and hope that a complete overhaul of our rooms will eliminate the problems mike89t experienced in his room. From the noise of the AC to the ability to hear your upstairs neighbors.  Once again that you so much for your review and we hope you will consider us in the future for a valuable stay!

Summary: Very friendly staff, great service for a long stay or short stay. For the price it is great.  It has a basketball court and a swimming pool. The shuttle service is always ready to take you where you need.
Manager Response: We thank S B for their wonderful review of our property. We love when we get such a great review from a Senior Contributor to Trip Advisor.  We are absolutely thrilled you and your family got the most out of your Orange County vacation with us by utilizing all of our great amenities. We are one of the few Marriott properties in the area that offer shuttle service and we are always happy to transport our guests within 5 miles of the property whenever they need it.  We hope you and your family will consider staying with us again when you return to the Orange County area to enjoy our property once more. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed 5 nights on business trip. Well kept, convenient breakfast, clean, friendly staff. Good location. Room was stocked with dishes and they'll even pick up groceries for you.   I'm not rating Value since my company paid for the room and I don't know how much it cost.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  Hope that during your next stay you will utilize the grocery shopping service and cook a meal in your suite.  We hope to see you again soon.  Sue

Summary Heading: Older version of RI layout, but nice place to stay.
Summary: Great place, very convenient to John Wayne Airport.  Its layout is the "version 1" of Residence Inn properties, in separate buildings like apartments, but it's easy to get around the property.  When I arrived to check in around 5:00 pm, the room I had reserved had not been cleaned, so they gave me an upgraded room (a "penthouse" room) at no charge.  The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly, and the free shuttle around the area was also nice.  This is in addition to all the usual Residence Inn amenities like free daily breakfast and free social hour on Mon-Wed.    It seems that they may be a bit shorthanded on the cleaning staff, since they typically didn't finish cleaning our room until late in the day and there were small evidences that the vacuuming wasn't as
Manager Response: I really appreciate you taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  I am so glad you were able to enjoy some of our amenities like the breakfast, social hours, and the shuttle.  I will follow up with our housekeeping staff and review our comments and look for ways to improve our service.  Thank you for the feedback and we hope to see you again soon!  Sue Cooke

Summary Heading: These are just the nicest people
Summary: I have been staying here four nights a week for the past few weeks.  I am on a contracting assignment and am coming in from Orlando, FL, so the bicoastal travel can be hard.  The folks at this Residence Inn do everything in their power to make it better and easier for me.  They are all very friendly and accommodating, from the front desk down to the ladies that cook the daily breakfast....always a smile.  The property is a bit older, so there are a few dings and scratches, but it is VERY, VERY CLEAN and the rooms are comfortable.  The location is great, I basically can find only good things to say!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: We are so excited to be your "home away from home" each week.  I can only imagine how tough it is to fly back and forth each week from one coast to the other and I am so happy that we are able to make things just a little bit easier for your.  We look forward to seeing you each week!  Sue Cooke

Summary: Myself as well as several colleagues stay at the Inn from six nights.  We found the staff very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were neat and cleaned promptly on a daily basis.  The complimentary breakfast was suitable.  Rosa and her daughter who manage same were both a true delight every single day we were there.  We used the grill for a group dinner and all went very well.  We would all stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We are so glad you enjoyed all the amenities we have including the BBQ and pool area.  I will pass on your wonderful comments to Rosa and Christina and recognize them for their service and making you feel like you were home.  We hope you will stay with us again when visiting the Costa Mesa Area. Sue Cooke

Summary: Stayed here for two nights.  Hotel is better than other Residence Inn I've stayed at, has great location, helpful staff, free internet, and good variety of complimentary breakfast.  Will stay here again next time I visit Newport Beach!
Manager Response: I really appreciate the positive comments and are so happy to hear that our staff took good care of you. We will look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sue Cooke

Summary: We have stayed with our two kids for 9 days. Extremely clean & punctual housekeeping staff (Mexican Housekeeping Neat-Clean Culture). Front desk were extremely informative of the area & very helpful. Location is extremely accessible to next door Dry-Cleaning (including serviced wash & fold), The Vons Supermarket is few minutes away by car as well as the well-known Coast Plaza Upscale Shopping mall. Many options of restaurant are also few minutes away by car and some are one minute walk away.They also serve basic but good breakfast in the morning as part of the stay. Parking is Free & front of your accommodation normally.   The only little issue I had is, since we booked the penthouse which is normally in a second floor, I had to carry the luggage up & down the stairs. Beds also
Manager Response: Our Penthouse Suites are so great for families with the two bedrooms and bathrooms.  Unfortunately, they are located on the second floor of the buildings and you do have to navigate the stairs with your luggage.  Next time please let us know and we will have our staff bring all your luggage to the room and also help when you are checking out.  I am so happy you were able to enjoy all the local shopping and dining options we have – and there are lots to choose from.  We hope that you and your family will come visit us next time you are in the Costa Mesa/Newport Beach area! Sue Cooke

Summary: I am a business traveler and would stay in 2 properties a week on an average. For the most part, my experience with hotels particularly those rated 3+ stars are excellent. Any issues as long as it doesn't ruin my day I really do not complain. But my stay with the Residence Inn in Costa Mesa is the most remembered and the recovery the front desk has made.  Here's why.   I came in late due to flight disruptions so if you can imagine how I look forward to the bed. Second, I was feeling sick so the more I really looking forward to get some rest. But in the middle of the night, 2 people tried to come into my room and woke me up. I immediately yelled suggesting this room is taken and they left. I think the front desk inadvertently resold my room. Since then my sleep was erratic. The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience.  I am so happy to hear how well Julie took care of you and was able to help you enjoy your stay after the issue you had the first night.  I will be sure to share your comments with her and the staff and we really appreciate it.  We hope we see you next time you are coming to Costa Mesa. Sue Cooke

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights. staff is helpful and nice but this is a very very average residence inn. nothing extraordinary. The rooms did smell a bit which was not the best. smelled like old food....Internet is however free in the rooms
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking the time to write about our hotel. We appreciate your comments and we will certainly use them to improve as our goal is to provide an extraordinary stay for our guests. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Great place! we were a short drive to Newport beach, there are grocery stores, gas stations, and shopping centers near by, we were able to cook a few meals in the room's kitchen.  The breakfast was great, they had ethnic foods to accommodate the diversity of guests.  Our room was across the pool and we were concerned about the noise but it wasn't a problem at all.  The housekeeping was done everyday.  The hotel was comfortable and the employees extremely nice and welcoming. Great place to stay if you want to save some money and still be close to the beach!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments about our hotel. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and will be sure to pass on your nice comments to our staff. We are so happy you got to relax and enjoy our breakfast buffet and enioy the nice location of our hotel. We hope to see you again next time you are in Costa Mesa!

Summary Heading: Great location for beach getaway on a budget
Summary: We planned an impromptu trek to the beach with our toddler and booked this on the same night we stayed.  Originally I was a big disappointed as I really wanted to stay much closer to the beach but this was the only thing available.  In all actuality, it was not very far from the beach - about a 20 minute drive with traffic.  The hotel had friendly staff, was clean, and quiet and being a Residence Inn, provided a comfortable room and enough space for 3 people to stay comfortably.  We would definitely stay here again, if we plan on going back to spend more time in the Newport Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank your for choosing our hotel for your last minute getaway! We are so happy you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to the beach and enjoy some relaxing time. We hope to see you this summer for another fun weekend in Newport Beach!

Summary: Everything about this hotel and our trip was wonderful. My husband was in Newport beach on business so we requested a quiet room on the top floor. Our request was granted, Our room was perfect. ALL the staff here are friendly and helpful. The rooms are cleaned everyday, Housekeeping does a great job. Breakfast was delicious with so much choice, A great way to start your day without having to hunt down a place to eat. The social hour provided dinner three nights for us. It was a great bonus when working all day to be able to eat onsite and then relax for the evening. The rooms are big and comfortable, Especially the bed and we loved having a full kitchen. I would highly recommend this hotel and will stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: We are so happy you took advantage of our delicious breakfast buffet and enjoyed the spacious rooms. I have passed on your comments to our Front Office Staff and Housekepeers and our entire staff is thrilled your stay was so enjoyable! Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Comfy low-rise hotel near the Coast!
Summary: Very nice property with just two stories.  Located in a quiet neighborhood a short drive from Newport Beach/Balboa in SoCal.  The morning fog breaks early here and there's a pool on the property to relax beside during the warm afternoons.  Good access to the beaches (Newport or Laguna) or Disneyland.  A good choice if flying into Orange County Airport or doing business in nearby Irvine Tech Zone/Univ. of Calif Irvine.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and our close proximity to so many attractions including Balboa Island which is a favorite. Remember, our complementary shuttle goes within 5 miles of the hotel so we can gladly pick you up from John Wayne Airport next time! We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Stayed in this hotel for a conference and absolutely loved it.  Location is easy to get in and out of and a lot of help from the front desk to find stuff.  The breakfast is nice, the courtyard is quiet.  It is close to some amazing shopping and not far from the beach.  I will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our location. Next time, enjoy a trip to nearby South Coast Plaza.  We look forward to seeing you again when you visit Costa Mesa!

Summary: We stayed here while dealing with local elderly parent issues. Not a fun trip, but this hotel really helped us stay upbeat. The facility is not brand new, but very comfortable, well laid out, and has everything we needed including washing machines/dryers, great breakfasts, newspapers, full kitchen, wine by the bottle, happy hour, etc. etc. Our room was crisp and clean. Sue, the Manager made us feel like old friends and glad to see us. We will undoubtedly need to return to Costa Mesa, and we will certainly stay here and maybe even get to take a dip in the nice pool!
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of all of the wonderful amenities we have to offer. We look forward to seeing you again when you travel to Costa Mesa and certainly reccomend a dip in the pool!

Summary: This was the best hotel i have ever stayed in! the staff was amazing!! They were so friendly i really felt like i was with family.  The bed was AMAZING!! I am going to buy the Sterns and Foster for my next bed!! Breakfast was good and i was amazed they had dinner too!  The Inn is only a 20 min walk to the mall and has a plaza with a restaurant right next door.  I will stay here anytime.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff helped make it even more memorable.  We hope to have you stay with us again soon and do some more shopping at South Coast Plaza or enjoy our breakfast.

Summary Heading: Best Three Months In a Hotel I could spend.
Summary: I spent three plus months at this location, the food was typically very good, actually the best of any Marriott Residence Inn I have stayed at, with the exception of the evening fare at the Pensacola FL location.  The staff is wonderful and very helpful.  The Manager (Sue) runs a good crew.  Good breakfast, great variety.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a part of our family for three months and we enjoyed getting to spend time with you.  We hope you come and visit us again soon.

Summary: We were only there for one night, but were very pleased with the accommodations.  We booked one of the 2-bedroom suites and it was like staying in an apartment.  The full kitchen was modern and very functional and it was great to have a little living room with a fireplace!  We found the beds to be really comfortable as well.  We had friends that stayed in the smaller rooms and they too raved about the accommodations.  There is a full breakfast served in the main lobby and it included something for everyone.   Check-out is not until noon, which suited us just fine :)
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  It is nice to have a fully equipped kitchen in the room, but glad you let us cook for you and were able to enjoy our full breakfast in the morning.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This place was excellent for our family get together (their was 20 of us).  It was close to Disneyland, to the beach, shopping and easy access to the freeways. Yes it is close to the highway and it is noisy but I found that it was not that bad.  We had two penthouse suites and they accommodated us nicely.  Other family members had books studio suites for the weekend.  Altogether we had booked 5 rooms.  All the rooms where clean and up to date with appliances.    The breakfast was always fresh and hot and the ladies who took care of the breakfast were extremely helpful and nice.  All the staff at the hotel where helpful.
Manager Response: We are so happy we were able to host your 50th Anniversary celebration and we enjoyed being able to help make it a success.  I will share your comments with our staff and hope that you can make this an annual "reunion" to spend with your family and friends.

Summary Heading: Residence Inn Costa Mesa Newport Beach
Summary: to whom it may concern...welltravelledfam has no clue what hes talking about. this place was clean and appliances were modern and updated, the bed was super comfortable and our stay was nothing but pleasant.  staff was helpful and courteous and i would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and that are staff was helpful and enjoyed our spacious suites.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I cannot believe Marriott would put their name on this property.  It looks like a rehabbed low income property.  The lobby area and front desk stinks like an old nursing home.  I am a platinum marriott member, so I was given what was referred to as the penthouse.  The room was sooooo creepy, a lower bedroom, and nasty loft above with a darkened comforter.  Everything was so outdated.  Also the property overlooks an abandoned bus parking lot and a liquor store.  Do not stay here.
Manager Response: I am so sorry that you were disappointed by your stay.  We are constantly doing upgrades and renovations to ensure our property looks up to date and I am sorry you were disappointed. We value your loyalty to Marriott as a Platinum member and hope that you will contact me prior to your next visit and I will ensure you will receive the level of Marriott service you have come to expect.  Thank you.

Summary: My teenage daughter and I were supposed to stay at the  Residence Inn Costa Mesa Newport Beach the night before her early morning athletic competition this weekend.  I chose the property primarily  because it offered a free hot breakfast and was close to both South Coast Plaza and the gymnastics meet.  Many reviewers have said that this is a quiet complex, but I was worried about freeway noise since it is near the 73.   However, when I emailed the property coordinator, Anne Nielsen, she assured me that even though the hotel was indeed quiet, she would have me assigned to a room furthest away from the freeway.  Then, when my daughter woke up sick Saturday morning and I had to cancel that evening's reservation, the front desk clerk--Andi, I think--was prompt in processing my
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments. We understand how things can happen unexpectedly and this is the season for colds.   I hope that next time you will be able to come and experience our hotel.  Thanks again and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Marriott Residence Inn Costa Mesa Newport
Summary: Highly recommend.  Stayed almost 30 days.  This is my favorite Residence Inn by far.  Service is great, friendly staff, close to the 405.  Hotel looks like an apartment compiles rather than your standard hotel.  Rooms are spacious and desk is large.  Close to shopping and everything else you need.  Will definitely stay here again next time I'm in Southern California.
Manager Response: Our Extended stay guests are so very important to us and I am so glad that you were able to make our hotel your home away from home.  I will share your comments with our staff and appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay.  Thank you! Sue Cooke

Summary: I love Residence Inn by Marriott. This particular location makes you feel like your stay is very “homey.” The hotel rooms are basically apartment style complexes. Literally, they look like apartment units. I stayed in a King so my hotel room felt like a studio. The hotel room was complete with a kitchen and a refrigerator. They also provide plates, utensils, coffee maker, and toaster. Just don’t leave anything dirty in the sink, otherwise it’ll be tossed. They provide a sofa and TV set in the living room area. The AC/heater unit works excellent. The bathroom is clean. They also have closets. The hotel room also provides free wi-fi. The hotel room was nice and quiet the entire time. One unique reason why I love the Residence Inn by Marriott chain is that they provide a free
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and so glad you were able to enjoy the breakfast each day and the Social Hours Monday through Wednesday.  We will be happy to welcome you "home" whenever you are in the area again.  Thank you again! Sue Cooke

Summary: Just had a group meeting at this hotel this past weekend. The staff went out of their way to help us and anticipated our needs before we asked them in some instances. Everyone from the front desk staff to the airport shuttle driver were very pleasant and easy to work with. The breakfast was good and plentiful with a fresh variety of foods. Would definately recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your meeting with us.  I will pass your great comments to our staff and we hope we get to see you again soon.  Sue Cooke General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel. The rooms were very large and comfortable. The staff was great. The location is fair,but the hotel does offer a shuttle within the local area which makes it very convenient. I truly look forward to my next visit to this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and I will pass your comments on to our staff.  The shuttle is great to get you anywhere within 5 miles which includes South Coast Plaza, the Fairgrounds, and John Wayne Airport.  We hope to see you again soon.  Sue Cooke

Summary Heading: Don't stay here on the weekends unless you have $850 to spare!
Summary: Booked a 2 bedroom suite for my fiancé 2 weeks before our wedding so she could get away with friends. I reserved the room through their reservation service on the phone and was told the room would come out to 239.00 for the night. At no time did the reservation specialist inform me of the 850$ weekend party fee. Once my fiancé checked in the staff ( who was very rude and unhelpful) informed her of the charge but since it was already the day for the reservation the room could not be cancelled without a penalty. The 850$ fee was charged to my credit card WITHOUT authorization! Thanks Residence Inn from taking $ 850 out of our wedding savings fund! Great way to treat a frequent Marriott customer and rewards member!
Manager Response: I am so sorry about the miscommunication regarding the charges we put on your credit card.  The authorization hold was released the day of check out and funds should of been available that week.  Again, I apologize for the lack of communication  Sue Cooke

Summary: I wanted to spend the weekend in Newport Beach but didn't want to spend a lot of money on a hotel since technically it's not too far from my house (I live in LA) and I could drive to and from OC in a day. I had my dog with me as well. I found this hotel that is dog friendly and because it's a little off the beaten path it's not as pricy as the other hotels in the area. I had a studio room that was so spacious by studio standards. It was very welcoming, clean and incredibly cozy. I actually remember thinking I wished I was staying an extra day or 2. The bed was so comfortable and it just felt like home away from home. I also liked how each room had it's own entrance from outside as if you were entering an apartment directly from the parking lot.
